text: @RandPaul You are beyond stupid 🙄 . The senate should immediately hold hearing to why under Trump and Republican watch over 83k Americans has died from #COVID19 and more than 1.3m has tested positive for the virus. And why we have over 30 mil unemployed . Under Trump & GOP ppl are dying.
